## StyleOpInfo type

`StyleOpInfo` represents the information of the style operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type StyleOpInfo = {
    type: 'style';
    from: number;
    to: number;
    path: string;
    value: {
        attributes: Indexable;
    };
};
```
**References:** [Indexable](./yorkie-js-sdk.indexable.md)
